apiProducts.label: Account Insights
apiProducts.description: AccountInsights lets you see up to 12 months of transaction information from a customer’s account. See what amounts are coming in and out, what currencies are being used, who the customer interacts with, and more.

apiProducts.label: Customer Insights
apiProducts.description: CustomerInsights lets you access specific personal data that has been checked by Know Your Customer (KYC) processes. Instantly check the customer’s postal addresses, date of birth, nationality and more.

apiProducts.label: AgeCertificate
apiProducts.description: AgeCertificate lets you quickly verify that a customer is over the age of 18. Using data checked by Know Your Customer (KYC) processes, it gives you an instant ‘under 18 / over 18’ response without supplying additional private information.

apiProducts.label: Payment Initiation Services
apiProducts.description: Can be operated by a licensed Payment Initiation Service Provider (PISP) possessing an eIDAS certificate with PSP_PI role for initiating payments and checking the status of such payments, as instructed by PSU.
